title: Bug 23787: Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: When accessing the Project Properties Info page on all motif platforms, it was observed that the page uses text fields for readonly fields (such as Path, Type, etc.), which results in a bad appearance. This issue was encountered in the integration build dated 09/17.
OB: The Project Properties Info page displays readonly fields as text fields.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should display readonly fields in a different format that doesn't use text fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a Project 
2. Right-click and choose Properties 
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (Path, Type, etc.)
